entities.name: RecurringAppointment
entities.description: The Master appointment of a recurring appointment series.

attributes.name: isWeekDayPattern
attributes.description: Indicates whether the weekly recurrence pattern is a daily weekday pattern. Valid for weekly recurrence pattern only.

attributes.name: ruleId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the recurrence rule that is associated with the recurring appointment series.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: isNthYearly
attributes.description: Indicates whether the recurring appointment series should occur after every N years. Valid for yearly recurrence pattern only.

attributes.name: stateCode
attributes.description: Shows whether the recurring appointment is open, scheduled, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled appointments are read-only and can't be edited.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: owningBusinessUnit
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the business unit that owns the recurring appointment series.

attributes.name: groupId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the recurring appointment series for which the recurrence information was updated.

attributes.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: optionalAttendees
attributes.description: Enter the account, contact, lead, user, or other equipment resources that are not needed at the recurring appointment, but can optionally attend.

attributes.name: lastExpandedInstanceDate
attributes.description: Date of last expanded instance of a recurring appointment series.

attributes.name: effectiveEndDate
attributes.description: Actual end date of the recurring appointment series based on the specified end date and recurrence pattern.

attributes.name: patternStartDate
attributes.description: Start date of the recurrence range.

attributes.name: isWorkflowCreated
attributes.description: Indicates whether the recurring appointment series was created from a workflow rule.

attributes.name: instanceTypeCode
attributes.description: Type of instance of a recurring appointment series.

attributes.name: isRegenerate
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: firstDayOfWeek
attributes.description: First day of week for the recurrence pattern.

attributes.name: subcategory
attributes.description: Type a subcategory to identify the recurring appointment type and relate the activity to a specific product, sales region, business group, or other function.

attributes.name: category
attributes.description: Type a category to identify the recurring appointment type, such as status meeting or service call, to tie the appointment to a business group or function.

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

attributes.name: outlookOwnerApptId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the Microsoft Office Outlook recurring appointment series owner that correlates to the PR_OWNER_APPT_ID MAPI property.

attributes.name: recurrencePatternType
attributes.description: Select the pattern type for the recurring appointment to indicate whether the appointment occurs daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly.

attributes.name: nextExpansionInstanceDate
attributes.description: Date of the next expanded instance of a recurring appointment series.

attributes.name: expansionStateCode
attributes.description: State code to indicate whether the recurring appointment series is expanded fully or partially.

attributes.name: priorityCode
attributes.description: Select the priority so that preferred customers or critical issues are handled quickly.

attributes.name: isBilled
attributes.description: Indicates whether the recurring appointment series was billed as part of resolving a case.

attributes.name: patternEndDate
attributes.description: End date of the recurrence range.

attributes.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: globalObjectId
attributes.description: Unique Outlook identifier to correlate recurring appointment series across Exchange mailboxes.

attributes.name: effectiveStartDate
attributes.description: Actual start date of the recurring appointment series based on the specified start date and recurrence pattern.

attributes.name: ownerId
attributes.description: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user.

attributes.name: dayOfMonth
attributes.description: The day of the month on which the recurring appointment occurs.

attributes.name: statusCode
attributes.description: Select the recurring appointment's status.

attributes.name: organizer
attributes.description: Enter the user who is in charge of coordinating or leading the recurring appointment to make sure the appointment is displayed in the user's My Activities view.

attributes.name: startTime
attributes.description: Start time of the recurring appointment series.

attributes.name: occurrences
attributes.description: Number of appointment occurrences in a recurring appointment series.

attributes.name: regardingObjectId
attributes.description: Choose the record that the recurring appointment series relates to.

attributes.name: isAllDayEvent
attributes.description: Select whether the recurring appointment is an all-day event to make sure that the required resources are scheduled for the full day.

attributes.name: seriesStatus
attributes.description: Indicates whether the recurring appointment series is active or inactive.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: isNthMonthly
attributes.description: Indicates whether the recurring appointment series should occur after every N months. Valid for monthly recurrence pattern only.

attributes.name: owningUser
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who owns the recurring appointment series.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: endTime
attributes.description: End time of the associated activity.

attributes.name: daysOfWeekMask
attributes.description: Bitmask that represents the days of the week on which the recurring appointment occurs.

attributes.name: subject
attributes.description: Type a short description about the objective or primary topic of the recurring appointment.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information to describe the recurring appointment, such as key talking points or objectives.

attributes.name: activityId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the recurring appointment series.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: requiredAttendees
attributes.description: Enter the account, contact, lead, user, or other equipment resources that are required to attend the recurring appointment.

attributes.name: instance
attributes.description: Specifies the recurring appointment series to occur on every Nth day of a month. Valid for monthly and yearly recurrence patterns only.

attributes.name: deletedExceptionsList
attributes.description: List of deleted instances of the recurring appointment series.

attributes.name: interval
attributes.description: Number of units of a given recurrence type between occurrences.

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: Duration of the recurring appointment series in minutes.

attributes.name: monthOfYear
attributes.description: Indicates the month of the year for the recurrence pattern.

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: Type the location where the recurring appointment will take place, such as a conference room or customer office.

attributes.name: scheduledStart
attributes.description: Scheduled start time of the recurring appointment series.

attributes.name: scheduledEnd
attributes.description: Scheduled end time of the recurring appointment series.

attributes.name: activityTypeCode
attributes.description: Type of activity.

attributes.name: isRegularActivity
attributes.description: Indicates whether the activity is a regular activity type or event type.

attributes.name: patternEndType
attributes.description: Select the type of end date for the recurring appointment, such as no end date or the number of occurrences.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: owningTeam
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the team who owns the recurring appointment series.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: isMapiPrivate
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: processId
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the process.

attributes.name: stageId
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the stage.

attributes.name: traversedPath
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: sortDate
attributes.description: Shows the date and time by which the activities are sorted.

attributes.name: isUnsafe
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: serviceId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for an associated service.
